name: The Best Vegan BBQ Sandwich with Soy Curls
description: Truly the Best Vegan BBQ Sandwich, made with soy curls. If you haven't cooked with soy curls before, you're missing out! Soy curls are made from whole soybeans, are non-GMO and have 10 grams of protein per serving. Perfect for potlucks, bbq's or game day!
recipeIngredient: 1 recipe  Quick and Easy Vegan Barbecue Sauce  (OR 18-20 ounces your favorite bbq sauce)
4-6  buns or rolls (1 for each person)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the entire bag of soy curls to a large bowl, and cover with warm water. Let soak for 10 minutes to re-hydrate, and then drain the excess water.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the entire bag of soy curls to a large bowl, and cover with warm water. Let soak for 10 minutes to re-hydrate, and then drain the excess water.

recipeInstructions.text: While the soy curls are soaking, make the Quick and Easy Vegan Barbecue Sauce, if using.
recipeInstructions.name: While the soy curls are soaking, make the Quick and Easy Vegan Barbecue Sauce, if using.

recipeInstructions.text: Once drained, put them back in the large bowl and pull them apart with your hands to create a more "pulled meat", if desired. This step is not completely necessary, but I like them a bit smaller and pulled.
recipeInstructions.name: Once drained, put them back in the large bowl and pull them apart with your hands to create a more "pulled meat", if desired. This step is not completely necessary, but I like them a bit smaller and pulled.

recipeInstructions.text: Now, place the soy curls in a large frying pan. Add 3/4 of the barbecue sauce and cook over low-medium heat, stirring frequently.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat, and serve on buns or rolls with Classic Vegan Coleslaw, if desired.
